item.title: 2D CPU Ray Tracer
item.description: 2D Ray Tracer made during Block C in Year 1 at BUAS. The ray tracer is written entirely in C++ and runs only on the CPU. This was followed by a quick snake spin-off to showcase the capabilities of the renderer.
